projects.title: The Pennsylvania Army
projects.subtitle: Home webpage for a gaming community
projects.details: This is a custom responsive website design. It uses plain HTML, CSS, and does asynchronous SQL calls with JS Fetch/PHP.

projects.title: Philly Sports Podcast
projects.subtitle: Future home page for a sports news podcast. Currently under development
projects.details: This is a full-stack project that utilizes a REST API using Express/Node.js for the backend. The frontend uses Angular 14, SCSS, and Typescript.
projects.tags: Express, Node.js, Typescript, SCSS, Angular, REST

projects.title: Tom Horgan Carpenter & Builder
projects.subtitle: Website design for Tom Horgan Carpenter & Builder
projects.details: This was a custom website design for a carpentry and home building company. It is a fully responsive and modern website design that uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: #PA Army App
projects.subtitle: Application for in-game info as well as a guild management tool.
projects.details: This progressive web application uses, HTML, CSS, JS with XHR/Fetch calls to SQL. Depending on level of authentication more features are available and operates as CRUD application.

projects.title: Guild Roster Manager
projects.subtitle: Roster management app for a gaming community
projects.details: This is a desktop application that works in tandem with a Node.js discord bot using the discord.js library on both ends to give a web based application for managing members from a discord server.
projects.tags: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, PHP, Node.js, Discord, Api

projects.title: MySwingCoach
projects.subtitle: Application for in-game info as well as a guild management tool.
projects.details: This progressive web application uses, HTML, CSS, JS with XHR/Fetch calls to SQL. Depending on level of authentication more features are available and operates as CRUD application.

projects.title: Discord Server Widget
projects.subtitle: Custom discord guild widget
projects.details: This is a simple discord widget utilizing the default discord widget JSON API. It is capable of displaying who is online, idle, or busy as well as the game or activity they are currently playing.
